name: Small Business Workshops
description: The SF LGBT Center Small Business Program offers small business workshops on different topics including marketing, finance, business planning, business law, and more, to help small business owners gain useful knowledge to run their business effectively. Questions? Contact Small Business consultant Eddie Tang at eddiet@sfcenter.org.
